text:
@JoeBiden China #coronavirus exposed in Dec after a month hide. In Feb20 it blasted to serious stage with fast spread, deaths & no treatment. What shock, Trump & Modi in their promotion politics,emergency action time was wasted. Italy wuhan linked caused damage.

Now all are paying price.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
